game.name: Kathana
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 카타나: 다크 에이지의 도래에서 모험이 기다립니다! 캐릭터를 선택하고, 친구들과 퀘스트를 수행하며, 도전적인 보스와 맞서고, 던전을 탐험하며, 길드 전쟁과 PvP 전투에 참여하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Adventure awaits in Kathana Select your character, quest with friends, face challenging bosses, explore dungeons, and engage in guild wars and PvP battles!

reviewHighlights.text: - game is full of bugs - connectivity issues - game store is very expensive - essential items are locked behind a paywall. unless you farm for rupiahs...
ugly model and really outdated setting, most of times you are watching game freeze, the game sever horrible not capable to allow this amount of in-gam...
